overview: In the future, the inmates of a private underground prison are computer-controlled with cameras, dream readers, and devices that can cause pain or death. John and his illegally pregnant wife Karen are locked inside "The Fortress" but are determined to escape before the birth of their baby.
tagline: Welcome to the future where punishment is the ultimate crime.
cast: Christophe Lambert|Kurtwood Smith|Loryn Locklin|Clifton Collins Jr.|Jeffrey Combs
